con:config.name: Create_Manager_IT00X
con:config.con:request:
<!-- ****************************************** --><!-- Create a few SuperUsers for WTK Only testing --><!-- Author: Pascal H. --><!-- ****************************************** --><Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request Action="Update" sequence="SuperUser IT001"> <Personality> <JobAssignmentData> <JobAssignment> <JobAssignmentDetailsData> <JobAssignmentDetails TimeZoneName="(GMT -05:00) Eastern Time" BaseWageHourly="0.00"/> </JobAssignmentDetailsData> <BaseWageRates> <BaseWageRate HourlyRate="0.00" EffectiveDate="${BeginingOfTime}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}"/> </BaseWageRates> </JobAssignment> </JobAssignmentData> <PersonInformationData> <PersonInformation> <AccessAssignmentData> <AccessAssignment AccessProfileName="Super Access" GroupScheduleName="All Schedule Groups" ManagerAccessSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerViewPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerTransferSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerWorkRuleName="All Work Rules" PreferenceProfileName="Super Access" ProfessionalPayCodeName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalTransferSetName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalWorkRuleName="Empty Profile" ReportName="All Reports" SchedulePatternName="All Pattern Templates" ShiftCodeName="All Shift Templates" AvailabilityPatternName="All Availability Templates" TransferEmployeeFlag="false" DelegateProfileName="Empty Profile" ApproveOvertimeFlag="false" HyperFindScheduleVisibilityName="All HyperFind Queries"/> </AccessAssignmentData> <PersonData> <Person> <PersonNumber>${IT001_PersonNumber}</PersonNumber> <FirstName>${IT001_FirstName}</FirstName> <LastName>${IT001_LastName}</LastName> <HireDate>${PastDate4y}</HireDate> </Person> </PersonData>
<PersonLicenseTypes> <PersonLicenseType ActiveFlag="true" LicenseTypeName="${License_WTK}"/> <PersonLicenseType ActiveFlag="true" LicenseTypeName="${License_WFManager}"/> </PersonLicenseTypes> <PersonAuthenticationTypes> <PersonAuthenticationType ActiveFlag="true" AuthenticationTypeName="Kronos"/> </PersonAuthenticationTypes>
<PersonAccessAssignments> <PersonAccessAssignment EffectiveDate="${PastDate4y}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" ProfessionalTransferOrganizationSetName="Empty Profile" ManagerAccessOrganizationSetName="All Organizational Maps" ManagerTransferOrganizationSetName="All Organizational Maps"/> </PersonAccessAssignments>
<UserAccountStatusList> <UserAccountStatus EffectiveDate="${PastDate4y}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" UserAccountStatusName="Active"/> </UserAccountStatusList>
</PersonInformation> </PersonInformationData>
<UserData> <User> <UserAccountData> <UserAccount> <LogonProfileName>Super Access</LogonProfileName> <PasswordUpdateFlag>false</PasswordUpdateFlag> <UserName>${IT001_Username}</UserName> <UserPassword>${IT001_Password}</UserPassword> </UserAccount> </UserAccountData> </User> </UserData> <GDAPAssignments>
<GDAPAssignment GDAPName="ALL_DATA_ACCESS_GROUP" Role="EMPLOYEE_ROLE" EffectiveDate="${day000}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" DefaultSwitch="true"> <Identity> <PersonIdentity PersonNumber="${IT001_PersonNumber}"/> </Identity> </GDAPAssignment>
<GDAPAssignment GDAPName="ALL_DATA_ACCESS_GROUP" Role="MANAGER_ROLE" EffectiveDate="${day000}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" DefaultSwitch="true"> <Identity> <PersonIdentity PersonNumber="${IT001_PersonNumber}"/> </Identity> </GDAPAssignment> </GDAPAssignments> </Personality> </Request>
<Request Action="Update" sequence="SuperUser IT002"> <Personality> <JobAssignmentData> <JobAssignment> <JobAssignmentDetailsData> <JobAssignmentDetails TimeZoneName="(GMT -05:00) Eastern Time" BaseWageHourly="0.00"/> </JobAssignmentDetailsData> <BaseWageRates> <BaseWageRate HourlyRate="0.00" EffectiveDate="${BeginingOfTime}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}"/> </BaseWageRates> </JobAssignment> </JobAssignmentData> <PersonInformationData> <PersonInformation> <AccessAssignmentData> <AccessAssignment AccessProfileName="Super Access" GroupScheduleName="All Schedule Groups" ManagerAccessSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerViewPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerTransferSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerWorkRuleName="All Work Rules" PreferenceProfileName="Super Access" ProfessionalPayCodeName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalTransferSetName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalWorkRuleName="Empty Profile" ReportName="All Reports" SchedulePatternName="All Pattern Templates" ShiftCodeName="All Shift Templates" AvailabilityPatternName="All Availability Templates" TransferEmployeeFlag="false" DelegateProfileName="Empty Profile" ApproveOvertimeFlag="false" HyperFindScheduleVisibilityName="All HyperFind Queries"/> </AccessAssignmentData> <PersonData> <Person> <PersonNumber>${IT002_PersonNumber}</PersonNumber> <FirstName>${IT002_FirstName}</FirstName> <LastName>${IT002_LastName}</LastName> <HireDate>${PastDate4y}</HireDate> </Person> </PersonData>
<PersonLicenseTypes> <PersonLicenseType ActiveFlag="true" LicenseTypeName="${License_WTK}"/> <PersonLicenseType ActiveFlag="true" LicenseTypeName="${License_WFManager}"/> </PersonLicenseTypes> <PersonAuthenticationTypes> <PersonAuthenticationType ActiveFlag="true" AuthenticationTypeName="Kronos"/> </PersonAuthenticationTypes>
<PersonAccessAssignments> <PersonAccessAssignment EffectiveDate="${PastDate4y}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" ProfessionalTransferOrganizationSetName="Empty Profile" ManagerAccessOrganizationSetName="All Organizational Maps" ManagerTransferOrganizationSetName="All Organizational Maps"/> </PersonAccessAssignments>
<UserAccountStatusList> <UserAccountStatus EffectiveDate="${PastDate4y}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" UserAccountStatusName="Active"/> </UserAccountStatusList>
</PersonInformation> </PersonInformationData>
<UserData> <User> <UserAccountData> <UserAccount> <LogonProfileName>Super Access</LogonProfileName> <PasswordUpdateFlag>false</PasswordUpdateFlag> <UserName>${IT002_Username}</UserName> <UserPassword>${IT002_Password}</UserPassword> </UserAccount> </UserAccountData> </User> </UserData> <GDAPAssignments>
<GDAPAssignment GDAPName="ALL_DATA_ACCESS_GROUP" Role="EMPLOYEE_ROLE" EffectiveDate="${day000}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" DefaultSwitch="true"> <Identity> <PersonIdentity PersonNumber="${IT002_PersonNumber}"/> </Identity> </GDAPAssignment>
<GDAPAssignment GDAPName="ALL_DATA_ACCESS_GROUP" Role="MANAGER_ROLE" EffectiveDate="${day000}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" DefaultSwitch="true"> <Identity> <PersonIdentity PersonNumber="${IT002_PersonNumber}"/> </Identity> </GDAPAssignment> </GDAPAssignments> </Personality> </Request>
<Request Action="Update" sequence="SuperUser IT003"> <Personality> <JobAssignmentData> <JobAssignment> <JobAssignmentDetailsData> <JobAssignmentDetails TimeZoneName="(GMT -05:00) Eastern Time" BaseWageHourly="0.00"/> </JobAssignmentDetailsData> <BaseWageRates> <BaseWageRate HourlyRate="0.00" EffectiveDate="${BeginingOfTime}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}"/> </BaseWageRates> </JobAssignment> </JobAssignmentData> <PersonInformationData> <PersonInformation> <AccessAssignmentData> <AccessAssignment AccessProfileName="Super Access" GroupScheduleName="All Schedule Groups" ManagerAccessSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerViewPayCodeName="All Pay Codes" ManagerTransferSetName="All Labor Accounts" ManagerWorkRuleName="All Work Rules" PreferenceProfileName="Super Access" ProfessionalPayCodeName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalTransferSetName="Empty Profile" ProfessionalWorkRuleName="Empty Profile" ReportName="All Reports" SchedulePatternName="All Pattern Templates" ShiftCodeName="All Shift Templates" AvailabilityPatternName="All Availability Templates" TransferEmployeeFlag="false" DelegateProfileName="Empty Profile" ApproveOvertimeFlag="false" HyperFindScheduleVisibilityName="All HyperFind Queries"/> </AccessAssignmentData> <PersonData> <Person> <PersonNumber>${IT003_PersonNumber}</PersonNumber> <FirstName>${IT003_FirstName}</FirstName> <LastName>${IT003_LastName}</LastName> <HireDate>${PastDate4y}</HireDate> </Person> </PersonData>

<UserAccountStatusList> <UserAccountStatus EffectiveDate="${PastDate4y}" ExpirationDate="${Forever}" UserAccountStatusName="Active"/> </UserAccountStatusList>
</PersonInformation> </PersonInformationData>

con:config.name: CreateVolumeDrivers
con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request action="AddOnly"> <VolumeDriver DecimalPosition="0" IsCurrency="false" IsEditRelated="false" IsReportingDriver="false" VolumeDriverName="CPSAlertThreshold1"/> <VolumeDriver DecimalPosition="0" IsCurrency="false" IsEditRelated="false" IsReportingDriver="false" VolumeDriverName="CPSAlertThreshold2"/> <VolumeDriver DecimalPosition="0" IsCurrency="false" IsEditRelated="false" IsReportingDriver="false" VolumeDriverName="CPSAlertThreshold3"/> <VolumeDriver DecimalPosition="0" IsCurrency="false" IsEditRelated="false" IsReportingDriver="false" VolumeDriverName="CPSAlertThreshold4"/> <VolumeDriver DecimalPosition="0" IsCurrency="false" IsEditRelated="false" IsReportingDriver="false" VolumeDriverName="CPSAlertThreshold5"/> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.name: DeleteVolumeDriver
con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request action="Delete"> <VolumeDriver VolumeDriverName="CPSAlert1"/> <VolumeDriver VolumeDriverName="CPSAlert2"/> <VolumeDriver VolumeDriverName="CPSAlert3"/> <VolumeDriver VolumeDriverName="CPSAlert4"/> <VolumeDriver VolumeDriverName="CPSAlert5"/> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.name: CreateAlertThresholdTwoDrivers1
con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request Action="AddOnly"> <ReforecastingAlertThreshold Name="AlertThresholdTwoDrivers" Description="AlertThreshold Description"> <AlertThresholdItems> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem TuesdayLowerThresholdValue="-5" MondayLowerThresholdValue="-13" MondayUpperThresholdValue="20" EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-7" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="12" VolumeDriverId="1" TuesdayUpperThresholdValue="12" Priority="2"/> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-5" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="15" VolumeDriverId="2" Priority="1"/> </AlertThresholdItems> </ReforecastingAlertThreshold> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.name: CreateAlertThresholdThreeDrivers1
con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request Action="AddOnly"> <ReforecastingAlertThreshold Name="AlertThresholdThreeDrivers" Description="AlertThreshold Description"> <AlertThresholdItems> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem TuesdayLowerThresholdValue="-5" MondayLowerThresholdValue="-13" MondayUpperThresholdValue="20" EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-7" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="12" VolumeDriverId="1" TuesdayUpperThresholdValue="12" Priority="1"/> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-5" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="15" VolumeDriverId="2" Priority="2"/> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem TuesdayLowerThresholdValue="-5" MondayLowerThresholdValue="-13" MondayUpperThresholdValue="20" VolumeDriverId="3" TuesdayUpperThresholdValue="12" Priority="3"/> </AlertThresholdItems> </ReforecastingAlertThreshold> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.name: HTTP Test Request
con:config.con:request: <Kronos_WFC version="1.0"> <Request Action="Update"> <ReforecastingAlertThreshold Name="Test2" Description="Test2"> <AlertThresholdItems> <ReforecastingAlertThresholdItem TuesdayLowerThresholdValue="-5" MondayLowerThresholdValue="-13" MondayUpperThresholdValue="20" EveryDayLowerThresholdValue="-10" EveryDayUpperThresholdValue="10" VolumeDriverId="1" TuesdayUpperThresholdValue="12" Priority="2"/> </AlertThresholdItems> </ReforecastingAlertThreshold> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>
